5G Toolbox: Design, simulate, and verify 5G wireless communication systems. Includes support for 5G NR physical layer, link-level simulation, and waveform generation.
AUTOSAR Blockset: Design and simulate AUTOSAR software components and compositions. Supports Classic and Adaptive AUTOSAR platforms.
Aerospace Blockset: Model and simulate aircraft, spacecraft, and propulsion systems. Includes flight dynamics, environmental models, and visualization tools.
Aerospace Toolbox: Analyze and visualize aerospace vehicle motion using standard models and algorithms. Includes coordinate transformations and flight parameters.
Antenna Toolbox: Design, analyze, and visualize antenna elements and arrays. Includes electromagnetic solvers and radiation pattern analysis.
Audio Toolbox: Design, test, and deploy audio processing systems. Includes audio I/O, signal processing, and machine learning for audio applications.
Automated Driving Toolbox: Design, simulate, and test automated driving systems. Includes sensor models, perception algorithms, and path planning.
Bioinformatics Toolbox: Analyze and visualize biological data. Includes sequence analysis, microarray data analysis, and protein structure analysis.
Bluetooth Toolbox: Design, simulate, and analyze Bluetooth communication systems. Supports Bluetooth Classic and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).
C2000 Microcontroller Blockset: Design and deploy applications for Texas Instruments C2000 microcontrollers using Simulink.
Communications Toolbox: Design, simulate, and analyze communications systems. Includes modulation, coding, channel models, and receiver algorithms.
Computer Vision Toolbox: Design and test computer vision and video processing systems. Includes object detection, tracking, and image classification.
Control System Toolbox: Design and analyze control systems. Includes PID tuning, state-space models, frequency response analysis, and controller design.
Curve Fitting Toolbox: Fit curves and surfaces to data. Includes linear and nonlinear parametric fitting, smoothing, and post-processing tools.
DDS Blockset: Design and simulate Data Distribution Service (DDS) applications for distributed systems.
DSP HDL Toolbox: Design and implement digital signal processing algorithms on FPGAs and ASICs using HDL code generation.
DSP System Toolbox: Design and simulate signal processing systems. Includes filters, transforms, spectral analysis, and adaptive algorithms.
Data Acquisition Toolbox: Acquire and output data from data acquisition hardware. Supports analog and digital I/O, counters, and triggers.
Database Toolbox: Connect to and interact with relational databases. Includes SQL query execution and database management tools.
Datafeed Toolbox: Connect to financial data services and retrieve market data. Supports real-time and historical data feeds.
Deep Learning HDL Toolbox: Design and implement deep learning networks on FPGAs and ASICs using HDL code generation.
Deep Learning Toolbox: Design, train, and deploy deep neural networks. Includes pretrained models, transfer learning, and GPU acceleration.
Econometrics Toolbox: Model and analyze economic and financial time series data. Includes regression, ARIMA, GARCH, and state-space models.
Embedded Coder: Generate optimized C and C++ code from MATLAB code and Simulink models for embedded systems.
Financial Instruments Toolbox: Price and analyze financial instruments. Includes derivatives, fixed-income securities, and risk metrics.
Financial Toolbox: Perform financial calculations and analysis. Includes portfolio optimization, time value of money, and cash flow analysis.
Fixed-Point Designer: Design and simulate fixed-point algorithms. Includes automatic data type selection and quantization analysis.
Fuzzy Logic Toolbox: Design and simulate fuzzy inference systems. Includes membership functions, rule-based systems, and fuzzy clustering.
GPU Coder: Generate optimized CUDA code from MATLAB code for NVIDIA GPUs. Accelerates computationally intensive algorithms.
Global Optimization Toolbox: Solve optimization problems with multiple local minima. Includes genetic algorithms, simulated annealing, and particle swarm.
HDL Coder: Generate synthesizable VHDL and Verilog code from MATLAB code and Simulink models for FPGA and ASIC designs.
HDL Verifier: Verify HDL implementations using cosimulation and FPGA-in-the-loop testing.
Image Acquisition Toolbox: Acquire images and video from cameras and frame grabbers. Supports various hardware interfaces and formats.
Image Processing Toolbox: Process, analyze, and visualize images. Includes filtering, segmentation, morphology, and geometric transformations.
Industrial Communication Toolbox: Design and simulate industrial communication protocols including Modbus, OPC, and EtherCAT.
Instrument Control Toolbox: Control test and measurement instruments. Supports GPIB, VISA, TCP/IP, and serial communication.
LTE Toolbox: Design, simulate, and verify LTE and LTE-Advanced communication systems. Includes physical layer and link-level simulation.
Lidar Toolbox: Process, analyze, and visualize lidar point clouds. Includes object detection, segmentation, and registration algorithms.
MATLAB: Core MATLAB environment for numerical computation, visualization, and programming. Includes built-in functions for math, graphics, and data analysis.
MATLAB Coder: Generate C and C++ code from MATLAB code. Includes MEX functions and standalone executables.
MATLAB Compiler: Package MATLAB applications as standalone executables, web apps, and software components.
MATLAB Compiler SDK: Create C/C++, .NET, Java, and Python libraries from MATLAB code for integration with other applications.
MATLAB Report Generator: Automatically generate reports from MATLAB results. Includes Word, PDF, HTML, and XML formats.
MATLAB Test: Write, run, and manage unit tests for MATLAB code. Includes test frameworks and code coverage analysis.
Mapping Toolbox: Display and analyze geographic data. Includes map projections, geodetic calculations, and terrain analysis.
Medical Imaging Toolbox: Process and analyze medical images. Includes DICOM support, image registration, and segmentation tools.
Mixed-Signal Blockset: Model and simulate mixed-signal systems with analog and digital components.
Model Predictive Control Toolbox: Design and simulate model predictive controllers for constrained multivariable systems.
Model-Based Calibration Toolbox: Calibrate engine and powertrain models. Includes design of experiments and optimization tools.
Motor Control Blockset: Design and simulate motor control systems. Includes field-oriented control and sensorless control algorithms.
Navigation Toolbox: Design and simulate navigation and tracking systems. Includes INS, GPS, and sensor fusion algorithms.
Optimization Toolbox: Solve linear, nonlinear, and mixed-integer optimization problems. Includes solvers for constrained and unconstrained optimization.
Parallel Computing Toolbox: Execute MATLAB code in parallel on multicore processors, GPUs, and computer clusters.
Partial Differential Equation Toolbox: Solve partial differential equations using finite element analysis. Includes structural, thermal, and electromagnetic analysis.
Phased Array System Toolbox: Design and simulate phased array radar and communication systems. Includes beamforming and direction-of-arrival estimation.
Powertrain Blockset: Model and simulate vehicle powertrain systems. Includes engine, transmission, and driveline components.
Predictive Maintenance Toolbox: Design condition monitoring and predictive maintenance algorithms. Includes feature extraction and remaining useful life estimation.
RF Blockset: Model and simulate RF systems and circuits. Includes amplifiers, mixers, filters, and RF impairments.
RF PCB Toolbox: Design and analyze RF printed circuit boards. Includes electromagnetic simulation and impedance matching.
RF Toolbox: Design, analyze, and visualize RF components and networks. Includes S-parameters, impedance matching, and filter design.
ROS Toolbox: Design, simulate, and deploy ROS-based robotics applications. Includes ROS node generation and message handling.
Radar Toolbox: Design, simulate, and analyze radar systems. Includes waveform design, target detection, and tracking algorithms.
Raspberry Pi Blockset: Deploy Simulink models to Raspberry Pi hardware for real-time execution.
Reinforcement Learning Toolbox: Design, train, and simulate reinforcement learning agents. Includes DQN, DDPG, and PPO algorithms.
Requirements Toolbox: Manage requirements and link them to models and code. Supports requirements traceability and validation.
Risk Management Toolbox: Measure and manage financial risk. Includes value-at-risk, credit risk, and market risk analysis.
Robotics System Toolbox: Design, simulate, and test robotics applications. Includes robot kinematics, dynamics, and motion planning.
Robust Control Toolbox: Design robust controllers for systems with uncertainty. Includes H-infinity and mu-synthesis methods.
Satellite Communications Toolbox: Design, simulate, and analyze satellite communication systems. Includes link budget analysis and waveform generation.
Sensor Fusion and Tracking Toolbox: Design and simulate multi-sensor tracking and navigation systems. Includes Kalman filters and particle filters.
SerDes Toolbox: Design and analyze serializer/deserializer (SerDes) systems for high-speed digital communication.
Signal Integrity Toolbox: Analyze signal integrity in high-speed digital systems. Includes eye diagrams, jitter analysis, and channel modeling.
Signal Processing Toolbox: Analyze, filter, and transform signals. Includes spectral analysis, filter design, and time-frequency analysis.
SimBiology: Model, simulate, and analyze biological systems. Includes pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, and systems biology.
SimEvents: Model and simulate discrete-event systems. Includes queues, servers, and event-driven processes.
Simscape: Model and simulate physical systems using physical modeling. Includes mechanical, electrical, hydraulic, and thermal components.
Simscape Battery: Model and simulate battery systems. Includes cell models, thermal effects, and aging.
Simscape Driveline: Model and simulate vehicle driveline systems. Includes transmissions, differentials, and clutches.
Simscape Electrical: Model and simulate electrical systems. Includes motors, generators, power electronics, and electrical networks.
Simscape Fluids: Model and simulate fluid systems. Includes hydraulic and pneumatic components, pumps, and valves.
Simscape Multibody: Model and simulate 3D mechanical systems. Includes rigid and flexible bodies, joints, and forces.
Simulink: Model, simulate, and analyze dynamic systems using block diagrams. Includes continuous and discrete-time simulation.
Simulink 3D Animation: Create 3D animations and virtual reality visualizations of Simulink models.
Simulink Check: Verify Simulink models for compliance with modeling standards and best practices.
Simulink Code Inspector: Analyze generated code from Simulink models for quality and compliance.
Simulink Coder: Generate C and C++ code from Simulink models for real-time applications and embedded systems.
Simulink Compiler: Package Simulink models as standalone executables and web apps.
Simulink Control Design: Design and analyze control systems in Simulink. Includes linearization, PID tuning, and frequency response.
Simulink Coverage: Measure model and code coverage for Simulink models and generated code.
Simulink Design Optimization: Optimize Simulink model parameters. Includes parameter estimation and response optimization.
Simulink Design Verifier: Prove properties and find design errors in Simulink models using formal methods.
Simulink Desktop Real-Time: Execute Simulink models in real-time on desktop computers with data acquisition hardware.
Simulink Fault Analyzer: Analyze fault propagation and system reliability in Simulink models.
Simulink PLC Coder: Generate IEC 61131-3 structured text and ladder logic from Simulink models for PLCs.
Simulink Real-Time: Execute Simulink models in real-time on Speedgoat target hardware.
Simulink Report Generator: Automatically generate reports from Simulink models and simulation results.
Simulink Test: Create, manage, and execute systematic tests for Simulink models.
SoC Blockset: Design and simulate system-on-chip (SoC) architectures. Includes processor, memory, and interconnect modeling.
Spreadsheet Link: Exchange data between MATLAB and Microsoft Excel spreadsheets.
Stateflow: Model and simulate state machines and flow charts. Includes hierarchical states, parallel states, and event-driven behavior.
Statistics and Machine Learning Toolbox: Analyze data and build machine learning models. Includes descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, and supervised/unsupervised learning.
Symbolic Math Toolbox: Perform symbolic mathematics. Includes calculus, linear algebra, equation solving, and formula manipulation.
System Composer: Design system architectures and allocate requirements. Includes system modeling and analysis.
System Identification Toolbox: Build mathematical models from measured data. Includes linear and nonlinear system identification.
Text Analytics Toolbox: Analyze and process text data. Includes natural language processing, sentiment analysis, and topic modeling.
UAV Toolbox: Design, simulate, and deploy unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) applications. Includes flight control and mission planning.
Vehicle Dynamics Blockset: Model and simulate vehicle dynamics. Includes tire models, suspension systems, and vehicle handling.
Vehicle Network Toolbox: Design and analyze vehicle network communication. Supports CAN, LIN, and FlexRay protocols.
Vision HDL Toolbox: Design vision algorithms for FPGAs using HDL code generation. Includes image processing and computer vision.
WLAN Toolbox: Design, simulate, and analyze wireless local area network (WLAN) systems. Supports IEEE 802.11 standards.
Wavelet Toolbox: Analyze signals and images using wavelets. Includes continuous and discrete wavelet transforms, and denoising.
Wireless HDL Toolbox: Design wireless communication algorithms for FPGAs using HDL code generation.
Wireless Network Toolbox: Design, simulate, and analyze wireless network protocols and systems.
Wireless Testbench: Test and validate wireless communication systems using hardware-in-the-loop testing.
